metadata.purpose: Baseline vet count extraction accuracy testing
metadata.methodology: Manual verification of staff pages + automated extraction comparison
metadata.notes: Each case manually verified by visiting the staff/team page directly

test_cases.notes: Clear case: all vets explicitly named with veterinarian titles, separate staff page

test_cases.practice_name: [PENDING - Boston area vet clinic with 1 vet]

test_cases.notes: Practice with no explicit staff page or vet names visible

selection_criteria: Mix of staff page types (dedicated /team, /staff, /doctors, embedded in /about)
Include edge cases: only owner listed, vet techs on page, missing pages
manual_verification_checklist: Count people with DVM, Doctor, Veterinarian in title
Ignore: techs, assistants, receptionists, managers without vet title
Note if Dr. prefix without explicit vet title (count only with context)
Record exact names and titles found
Note if page doesn't exist or is hidden
where_to_find_vets: About page: may list vets inline
Contact page: sometimes lists vet names
Google Maps listing: may have team photos/names

research_log.status: In Progress - Need to add 17-19 more test cases
next_steps: Search Boston area vet clinics for diverse examples
Record actual vet count and names
